name: SABIC INNOVATIVE PLASTICS US LLC
sampleDescriptions: Discussion of CAFE standards, lightweight plastics and automotive applications, discussion on autonomous vehicles
Advocated in favor of rail switching options and for quick nomination, appointment and approval of members for vacancies on the Surface Transporation Board
Advocated on the importance of access to foreign markets for chemical and plastic products manufactured in the United States of America, including NAFTA.
Advocated for inclusion of provisions to require open competition in piping in future transportation and infrastructure legislation
